description:

Over a year ago, a trans-identified female killed three kids and three adults at an elementary school in Nashville. Whereas the media is able to find and publish any writing left behind almost immediately after a tragedy, this "manifesto" was kept hidden from the public. The eighty-page document was released today.

Louder with Crowder was the first to release pages from the shooter's manifesto in November 2023. Hale hoped to have a “high death count” and wanted to “kill” ki
title: "God, I am such a pervert": Tennessee Star Releases ‘Manifesto’ Left by Trans Covenant School Killer

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

A few weeks ago, I wrote an article about the national embarrassment that is our astronauts stranded in outer space.

Quick reminder:

Butch Wilmore and Sunita Williams went to space on June 5, 2024 for an eight day test mission to ISS. Boeing's space junk failed and now they're stuck up there until February of 2025 unless Elon Musk can rescue them because we are no longer a serious country.

Well, there's an update.
title: WTF is happening in space? An update on the stranded American astronauts

description:
Michael Patrick Leahy of The Star News Network joined us today to break major news surrounding Covenant School shooter Audrey Hale, a group of Turkish nationalists attacked and tried to kidnap US Marines in broad daylight, Vice President Kamala Harris is campaigning in swing states, we are two months away from Election 2024 and the race is looking tight in the polls, President Donald Trump’s visit to Arlington National Cemetery is being criticized and the families of fallen soldiers are speaking out in his defense, and so much more!

title: EXCLUSIVE: Nashville Manifesto Update (Sources)
